actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill entitled "The American Copper Production Act of 1985".

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to impose limits on the amount of certain copper articles (including black copper, blister copper, anode copper, and unwrought copper) provided for in the Tariff Schedules of the United States that may be entered into the United States during the five-year period after the enactment of this Act and during any quarter of a year therein. Requires the Secretary to equitably allocate the aggregate quantities of copper articles among foreign countries.

titles.title: A bill entitled "The American Copper Production Act of 1985".
